name: Augment Summoning, Mythic

sections.body: Any creature you summon using a summon spell is considered mythic for the purpose of interacting with other mythic creatures. It doesn't gain any mythic abilities or power, but is affected by mythic spells and abilities as if it were a 1st-tier mythic creature. Additionally, if the creature summoned has damage reduction, its damage reduction becomes DR/epic.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your summoning spells bring not mere ordinary beasts, but instead mythic creatures.
